1370: Barwoud moved to Den Hof.B.4 after marriage.
Got married to Gertrudis at age 22 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Sophia, at age 22.
1372: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Volcwiif, at age 24.
1374: Had a son with Gertrudis, Siabbo, at age 26.
1375: Lost son Siabbo when Siabbo was 2 years old.
1376: Had a son with Gertrudis, Reymar, at age 28.
1377: Had a son with Gertrudis, Brun, at age 29.
Lost daughter Volcwiif when Volcwiif was 6 years old.
1378: Lost his wife Gertrudis while she was giving birth to Salomon in 1378.
Became caretaker of Sophia, Reymar, Brun, Salomon at age 31.
1380: Lost son Brun when Brun was 4 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
